game.name: Evil Rises
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Evil Rises is a round based top-down-shooter survival horror game, taking place in a collapsing, infested world. Get to the highest round and save earth from the oncoming hordes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Evil Rises is a round based top-down-shooter survival horror game, taking place in a collapsing, infested world. Get to the highest round and save earth from the oncoming hordes.
